[ RFC 2877 ] 
   +------------------------------------------------------------------+
   |       +-----  Pass-Through header                                |
   |       |          +---  Response data                             |
   |       |          |            +----  Start diagnostic information|
   |       |          |            |                                  |
   | +----------++----------++--------------------------------------- |
   | |          ||          ||                                        |
   | 004912A090000560060020C0003D0000C9F9F0F2E3C1D9C7C5E34040D7C3D7D9 |
   |                                 |      | T A R G E T     P C P R |
   |                                 +------+                         |
   |                           Response Code (I902)                   |
   |                                                                  |
   | ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
   |                                                                  |
   | C9D5E3C5D9400000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000 |
   |  I N T E R                                                       |
   |                                                                  |
   |                  +------- End of diagnostic information          |
   |                  |                                               |
   | -----------------+                                               |
   |                  |                                               |
   | 000000000000000000                                               |
   +------------------------------------------------------------------+
    Figure 1. Example of a success response record.
[ RFC 2877 ] 
   +------------------------------------------------------------------+
   |       +-----  Pass-Through header                                |
   |       |          +---  Response data                             |
   |       |          |            +----  Start diagnostic information|
   |       |          |            |                                  |
   | +----------++----------++--------------------------------------- |
   | |          ||          ||                                        |

   |                                 |      | T A R G E T     P C P R |
   |                                 +------+                         |
   |                           Response Code (8902)                   |
   |                                                                  |
   | ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
   |                                                                  |
   | C9D5E3C5D9400000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000 |
   |  I N T E R                                                       |
   |                                                                  |
   |                  +------- End of diagnostic information          |
   |                  |                                               |

[ RFC 2877 ] 
   +------------------------------------------------------------------+
   |   +-- Length of structure (LLLL)                                 |
   |   |                                                              |
   |   |    +-- GDS identifier                                        |
   |   |    |                                                         |
   |   |    |    +-- Data flow record                                 |
   |   |    |    |                                                    |
   |   |    |    |   +-- Length of pass-through specific header (LL)  |
   |   |    |    |   |                                                |
   |   |    |    |   |   +-- Flags                                    |
   |   |    |    |   |   |                                            |
   |   |    |    |   |   |   +-- Printer operation code               |
   |   |    |    |   |   |   |                                        |
   |   |    |    |   |   |   |      +-- Diagnostic field - zero pad to|
   |   |    |    |   |   |   |      |   LL specified                  |
   |   |    |    |   |   |   |      |                                 |
   |   |    |    |   |   |   |      |            +-- Printer data     |
   |   |    |    |   |   |   |      |            |                    |
   | +--+ +--+ +--+ ++ +--+ ++ +----------+ +----------------+        |
   | |  | |  | |  | || |  | || |          | |                |        |
   | xxxx 12A0 xxxx xx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxxx ... print data ...        |
   |                                                                  |
   +------------------------------------------------------------------+
    Figure 3. Layout of the printer pass-through header
[ RFC 2877 ] 
  +--------------------------------------------------------------------+
  |   +-- Length of structure (LLLL)                                   |
  |   |    +-- GDS identifier                                          |
  |   |    |    +-- Data flow record                                   |
  |   |    |    |   +-- Length of pass-through specific header (LL)    |
  |   |    |    |   |   +-- Flags                                      |
  |   |    |    |   |   |   +-- Printer operation code                 |
  |   |    |    |   |   |   |      +-- Zero pad to LL specified (0A)   |
  |   |    |    |   |   |   |      |            +-- Printer data       |
  |   |    |    |   |   |   |      |            |                      |
  | +--+ +--+ +--+ ++ +--+ ++ +----------+ +---------------------------|
  | |  | |  | |  | || |  | || |          | |                           |
  | 0085 12A0 0101 0A 1800 01 000000000000 34C4012BD20345FF2BD2044C0002|
  |                                                                    |
  | ------------------------------------------------------------       |
  |                                                                    |
  | 2BD2040D00002BD20A8501010201030204022BD20309022BD2061100014A       |
  |                                                                    |
  | ------------------------------------------------------------       |
  |                                                                    |
  | 402BD20601010000012BD306F60000FFFF2BD20A48000001000000010100       |
  |                                                                    |
  | ------------------------------------------------------------       |
  |                                                                    |
  | 2BD10705000B0090012BD2044900F02BD206404A403DE02BD2041500F034       |
  |                                                                    |
  |    end of printer data                                             |

  |                          |                                         |
  | C4012BD10381FF002BC8034001                                         |

        P(F) = TRUE <- : -> P(F) = FALSE
                       :

            |          :          |  universe of fax documents (F)
            | Included : Excluded |  from which some acceptable subset
            |          :          |  is selected by the predicate P.

[ RFC 2885 ] 
          +------------------------------------------------------+
          |Media Gateway                                         |
          | +-------------------------------------------------+  |
          | |Context                          +-------------+ |  |
          | |                                 | Termination | |  |
          | |                                 |-------------| |  |
          | |  +-------------+             +->| SCN Bearer  |<---+->
          | |  | Termination |   +-----+   |  |   Channel   | |  |
          | |  |-------------|   |     |---+  +-------------+ |  |
        <-+--->| RTP Stream  |---|  *  |                      |  |
          | |  |             |   |     |---+  +-------------+ |  |
          | |  +-------------+   +-----+   |  | Termination | |  |
          | |                              |  |-------------| |  |
          | |                              +->| SCN Bearer  |<---+->
          | |                                 |   Channel   | |  |
          | |                                 +-------------+ |  |
          | +-------------------------------------------------+  |
          |                                                      |
          |                                                      |
          |                    +------------------------------+  |
          |                    |Context                       |  |
          |  +-------------+   |              +-------------+ |  |
          |  | Termination |   | +-----+      | Termination | |  |
          |  |-------------|   | |     |      |-------------| |  |
        <-+->| SCN Bearer  |   | |  *  |------| SCN Bearer  |<---+->
          |  |   Channel   |   | |     |      |   Channel   | |  |
          |  +-------------+   | +-----+      +-------------+ |  |
          |                    +------------------------------+  |
          |                                                      |
          |                                                      |
          | +-------------------------------------------------+  |
          | |Context                                          |  |
          | |  +-------------+                +-------------+ |  |
          | |  | Termination |   +-----+      | Termination | |  |

          | |  |   Channel   |   |     |      |   Channel   | |  |
          | |  +-------------+   +-----+      +-------------+ |  |

[ RFC 2885 ] 
          +------------------------------------------------------+
          |Media Gateway                                         |
          | +-------------------------------------------------+  |
          | |Context C1                                       |  |
          | |  +-------------+                +-------------+ |  |
          | |  | Term. T2    |   +-----+      | Term. T1    | |  |
          | |  |-------------|   |     |      |-------------| |  |
        <-+--->| RTP Stream  |---|  *  |------| SCN Bearer  |<---+->
          | |  |             |   |     |      |   Channel   | |  |

[ RFC 2885 ] 
          +------------------------------------------------------+
          |Media Gateway                                         |
          | +-------------------------------------------------+  |
          | |Context C1                                       |  |
          | |  +-------------+                                |  |
          | |  | Term. T2    |   +-----+                      |  |
          | |  |-------------|   |     |                      |  |
        <-+--->| RTP Stream  |---|  *  |                      |  |
          | |  |             |   |     |                      |  |
          | |  +-------------+   +-----+                      |  |

          | |  | Term. T1    |   +-----+      | Term. T3    | |  |

[ RFC 2885 ] 
            Context 1           Context 2           Context 3
      +------------------+  +------------------+  +------------------+
      |      +----+      |  |      +----+      |  |      +----+      |
      |      | T2 |      |  |      | T2 |      |  |      | T2 |      |
      |      +----+      |  |      +----+      |  |      +----+      |
      |       ^  ^       |  |          ^       |  |          ^       |
      |       |  |       |  |          |       |  |          |       |
      |    +--+  +--+    |  |          +---+   |  |          +--+    |
      |    |        |    |  |              |   |  |             |    |
      |    v        v    |  |              v   |  |             |    |
      | +----+    +----+ |  | +----+    +----+ |  | +----+    +----+ |
      | | T1 |<-->| T3 | |  | | T1 |<-->| T3 | |  | | T1 |<-->| T3 | |
      | +----+    +----+ |  | +----+    +----+ |  | +----+    +----+ |
      +------------------+  +------------------+  +------------------+
       1. No Topology Desc.  2. T1, T2 Isolate     3. T3, T2 oneway

            Context 1           Context 2           Context 3
      +------------------+  +------------------+  +------------------+
      |      +----+      |  |      +----+      |  |      +----+      |
      |      | T2 |      |  |      | T2 |      |  |      | T2 |      |
      |      +----+      |  |      +----+      |  |      +----+      |
      |          |       |  |          ^       |  |       ^  ^       |
      |          |       |  |          |       |  |       |  |       |
      |          +--+    |  |          +---+   |  |    +--+  +--+    |
      |             |    |  |              |   |  |    |        |    |
      |             v    |  |              v   |  |    v        v    |
      | +----+    +----+ |  | +----+    +----+ |  | +----+    +----+ |
      | | T1 |<-->| T3 | |  | | T1 |<-->| T3 | |  | | T1 |<-->| T3 | |
      | +----+    +----+ |  | +----+    +----+ |  | +----+    +----+ |
      +------------------+  +------------------+  +------------------+
       4. T2, T3 oneway      5. T2, T3 bothway     6. T1, T2 bothway
[ RFC 2885 ] 
       +----------------------------------------------------------+
       | Transaction x                                            |
       |  +----------------------------------------------------+  |
       |  | Action 1                                           |  |
       |  | +---------+  +---------+  +---------+  +---------+ |  |
       |  | | Command |  | Command |  | Command |  | Command | |  |
       |  | |    1    |  |    2    |  |    3    |  |    4    | |  |
       |  | +---------+  +---------+  +---------+  +---------+ |  |
       |  +----------------------------------------------------+  |
       |                                                          |
       |  +----------------------------------------------------+  |
       |  | Action 2                                           |  |
       |  | +---------+                                        |  |
       |  | | Command |                                        |  |
       |  | |    1    |                                        |  |
       |  | +---------+                                        |  |
       |  +----------------------------------------------------+  |
       |                                                          |
       |  +----------------------------------------------------+  |
       |  | Action 3                                           |  |
       |  | +---------+  +---------+  +---------+              |  |
       |  | | Command |  | Command |  | Command |              |  |
       |  | |    1    |  |    2    |  |    3    |              |  |
       |  | +---------+  +---------+  +---------+              |  |
       |  +----------------------------------------------------+  |

[ RFC 2888 ]

                 .........|\|....
                          |
                +-----------------+
                |Enterprise Router|
                +-----------------+
                    |
                    |   DMZ - Network
               ---------------------------------
                |            |                |
               +--+         +--+         +----------+
               |__|         |__|         | Firewall |
              /____\       /____\        +----------+
              DMZ-Name     DMZ-Web  ...    |
              Server       Server          |
                                           |
                                ------------------

                              (  Internal Network  )
                             (   (private to the    )
                              (   enterprise)      )
                               (_________________ )

                                  WAN  |

                           |Enterprise Router|

[ RFC 2892 ] 
   if (MODE == 4,5)-------------------------------->[to host]--->|
           |                                                     |
           v                                                     |
   if (MODE == 6)---------------------------------->[strip]----->|
           |                                                     |
           v                                                     |
   if (!WRAPPED                                                  |
      & WRONG_RING_ID)-------------------------------------------|--->|
           |                                                     |    |
           v                                                     |    |
   if (MODE == 0,1,2,3)------------------------------------------|--->|
           |                                                     |    |
           v                                                     |    |
   if (DA MATCH)--------------->if !(SA MATCH)----->[to host]--->|    |
           |                            |                        |    |
           |                            v                        |    |
           |                    if (unicast)------->[to host]--->|    |
           |                            |                        |    |
           |                            v                        |    |
   if (SA MATCH)-------------------->[strip]-------------------->|    |
           |                                                     |    |
           |                                                     |    v
           |--------------------------->|<-----------------------|----|
                                        |                        |
                                        v                        |
                                if (ttl < 2)------->[strip]----->|
                                        |                        |
                                        v                        |
                                [decrement ttl]                  |
                                        |                        |
                                [fwd pkt to tb]                  |
                                        |                        v
                                        |<-----------------------|
                                        v
                                  [back to top]
[ RFC 2892 ] 
   if (TB_High has pkt)----------->[send pkt from TB_high]-->|
           |                                                 |
           v                                                 |
   if (TB_Low full)------------------------------------------|---->|
           |                                                 |     |
           v                                                 |     |
   if (Tx_High has pkt)----------->[send pkt from Tx_high]-->|     |
           |                                                 |     |
           v                                                 |     |
   if (TB_Low > Hi threshold)--------------------------------|---->|
           |                                                 |     |
           v                                                 |     |
   if (my_usage >= allowed_usage)----------------------------|---->|
           |                                                 |     |
           v                                                 |     |
   if (Tx_Low has pkt)------------>[send pkt from Tx_low]--->|     |
           |                                                 |     |
           |                                                 |     v
           |<------------------------------------------------|-----|
           |                                                 |
           v                                                 |
   if (TB_Low has pkt)------------>[send pkt from TB_low]--->|
           |                                                 v
           |<------------------------------------------------|
           |
           v
       [Go to Top]
[ RFC 2892 ] 
      {SF,A,W,S}
               -------------------------------
              |  -----X---------------------  |
              | |     fiber                 | |
              | v     cut       {IDLE,B,W,S}| v
             -----                         -----
             | A |                         | B |
             |   |                         |   |
             -----                         -----
              ^ | {SF,A,W,L}              i ^ | o {SF,B,W,L}
              | |                         n | | u
              | |                         n | | t
              | |                         e | | e
              | v                         r | v r
[ RFC 2892 ] 
                         Local FS,SF,SD,MS req.
             ---------   or Rx{REQ,SRC,W,S} from mate
            |   IDLE  |-------------------------------------------
            |         |<----------------------------------------  |
             ---------   Local REQ clears                       | |
                ^ |      or Rx{IDLE,SRC,I,S}                    | |
                | |                                             | |
                | |                                             | |
                | |                                             | |
                | |                                             | |
Rx{IDLE,SRC,I,S}| | Rx{REQ,SRC,W,L}                             | |
                | |                                             | |
                | |                                             | |
                | v    Local FS,SF,SD,MS REQ > Active req.      | v
             --------- or Rx{REQ,SRC,W,S},REQ > Active req.  ---------
            |  PASS   |------------------------------------>| WRAPPED |
            |  THRU   |<------------------------------------|         |
             ---------                                       ---------
             Forwards                   Tx{REQ,SELF,W,S} for local REQ
             {REQ,SRC,W,L}              Tx{IDLE,SELF,W,S} for mate REQ
                                        & Tx{REQ,SELF,W,L}

          |              96-bits                 |   32-bits    |

[ RFC 2895 ] 
   +---+--------------------------+---+---------------+
   | c !                          | c !  protocolDir  |
   | n !  protocolDirID           | n !  Parameters   |
   | t !                          | t !               |
   +---+--------------------------+---+---------------+
[ RFC 2895 ] 
    protocolDirID
   +----------------------------------------+
   |                                        |
   |              4 * N octets              |
   |                                        |
   +----------------------------------------+
[ RFC 2895 ] 
   protocolDirID                   protocolDirParameters
   +---+--------+--------+--------+--------+---+---+---+---+---+
   | c |  proto |  proto |  proto |  proto | c |par|par|par|par|
   | n |  base  | L(B+1) | L(B+2) | L(B+3) | n |ba-| L3| L4| L5|
   | t |(+flags)|   L3   |   L4   |   L5   | t |se |   |   |   |
   +---+--------+--------+--------+--------+---+---+---+---+---+ subOID
   | 1 |   4    |    4   |    4   |    4   | 1 | 1 | 1 | 1 | 1 | count
[ RFC 2895 ] 
   protocolDirID
   +--------+--------+--------+--------+
   |  proto |  proto |  proto |  proto |
   |   base |    L3  |   L4   |   L5   |
   |        |        |        |        |
   +--------+--------+--------+--------+ octet
   |    4   |    4   |    4   |    4   | count

   protocolDirParameters
   +---+---+---+---+
   |par|par|par|par|
   |ba-| L3| L4| L5|
   |se |   |   |   |
   +---+---+---+---+ octet
   | 1 | 1 | 1 | 1 | count
[ RFC 2895 ] 
             Fig. 2
        base-identifier format
        +---+---+---+---+
        |   |   |   |   |
        | f |op1|op2| m |
        |   |   |   |   |
        +---+---+---+---+ octet
        | 1 | 1 | 1 | 1 | count
[ RFC 2895 ] 
            802-1Q  Child Layer-Identifier Format
            +--------+--------+--------+--------+
            |  Base  |                          |
            |   ID   |   base-specific format   |
            |        |                          |
            +--------+--------+--------+--------+
            |    1   |             3            | octet count
[ RFC 2903 ] 
   +------+      +-------+      +-------+      +-------+      +-------+
   |      | auth |       | auth |       | auth |       | auth |       |
   |      |<---->|  AAA  |<---->|  AAA  |<---->|  AAA  |<---->|  AAA  |
   |      |      |       |      |       |      |       |      |       |
   |      |      +-------+      +-------+      +-------+      +-------+
   | User |          |              |              |              |
   |      |          |          +-------+      +-------+      +-------+
   |      |          |          |  BB   |      |  BB   |      |Budget |
   |      |          |          +-------+      +-------+      +-------+
   |      |          |              |              |
   |      |      +-------+          |              |
   |      |      |dial in|      +-------+      +-------+
   |      |<====>|service|<====>|network|<====>|network|<===> Experiment
   +------+      +-------+      +-------+      +-------+
[ RFC 2903 ] 
                    +-------+
                    |  AAA  |<---1---> to AAA server as in fig. 2
   request <---4--->|GateWay|
                    |       |<---2---> optionally to ASM/service

[ RFC 2903 ] 
                            |                  |
             +--------------|----+             |
             | Service      2    |             2
             | Application  |    |             |
             |  +-------------+  |      +-------------+
             |  | Application |  |      | Application |
             |  |  Specific   |  |      |  Specific   |
             |  |   Module    |  |      |   Module    |
             |  +-------------+  |      +-------------+
             |         |         |             |
             |         5         |             5
             |         |         |             |
             |  +-------------+  |      +-------------+
             |  |   Service   |  |      |   Service   |
             |  |             |  |      |  Equipment  |
             |  +-------------+  |      +-------------+
             +-------------------+
[ RFC 2904 ] 
               +------+      +-------------------------+
               |      |      | User Home Organization  |
               |      |      |  +-------------------+  |
               |      |      |  |    AAA Server     |  |
               |      |      |  |                   |  |
               |      |      |  +-------------------+  |
               |      |      |                         |
               |      |      +-------------------------+
               |      |
               |      |
               |      |
               | User |      +-------------------------+
               |      |      | Service Provider        |
               |      |      |  +-------------------+  |
               |      |      |  |    AAA Server     |  |
               |      |      |  |                   |  |
               |      |      |  +-------------------+  |
               |      |      |                         |

               |      |      |  |     Equipment     |  |
               |      |      |  +-------------------+  |
               |      |      |                         |

              +------+      +-------------------------+
              |      |      | User Home Organization  |
              |      |======|  +-------------------+  |
              |      |      |  |    AAA Server     |  |
              |      |      |  |                   |  |
              |      |      |  +-------------------+  |
              |      |      |                         |
              |      |      +-------------------------+
              |      |                  ||
              |      |                  ||
              |      |                  ||
              | User |      +-------------------------+
              |      |      | Service Provider        |
              |      |      |  +-------------------+  |

            |      |   1  |  +-------------------+  |

            |      |<-----+--|                   |  |
            |      |   4  |  +-------------------+  |
            | User |      |          |  /|\         |
            |      |      |          |2  |3         |

[ RFC 2904 ] 
                          +-------------------------+
            +------+      | Service Provider        |
            |      |      |  +-------------------+  |
            |      |      |  |    AAA Server     |  |
            |      |      |  |                   |  |
            |      |      |  +-------------------+  |
            | User |      |         /|\  |          |
            |      |      |          |2  |3         |
            |      |      |          |  \|/         |

            |      |------+->|      Service      |  |
            |      |<-----+--|     Equipment     |  |

[ RFC 2904 ] 
                            +-------------------------+
              +------+      | Service Provider        |
              |      |   1  |  +-------------------+  |
              |      |------+->|    AAA Server     |  |
              |      |<-----+--|                   |  |
              |      |   2  |  +-------------------+  |
              | User |      |                         |
              |      |      |                         |
              |      |      |                         |
              |      |   3  |  +-------------------+  |
              |      |------+->|      Service      |  |
              |      |<-----+--|     Equipment     |  |
              |      |   4  |  +-------------------+  |
              +------+      |                         |
                            +-------------------------+
[ RFC 2904 ] 
            +------+      +-------------------------+
            |      |   1  | User Home Organization  |
            |      |----->|  +-------------------+  |
            |      |      |  |    AAA Server     |  |
            |      |<-----|  |                   |  |
            |      |   4  |  +-------------------+  |
            |      |      |                         |
            |      |      +-------------------------+
            |      |                 |  /|\
            |      |                 |2  |3
            |      |                \|/  |
            | User |      +-------------------------+

            |      |      |  +-------------------+  |

            |      |      |                         |

[ RFC 2904 ] 
            +------+      +------------------------------+
            |      |      | User Home Organization       |
            |      |      |  +-------------------+  PRP  |
            |      |      |  |    AAA Server     |  PIP  |
            |      |      |  |                   |  PDP  |
            |      |      |  +-------------------+       |
            |      |      |                              |
            |      |      +------------------------------+
            |      |
            |      |

            |      |      |  +-------------------+  PRP  |

            | PDP  |      |  +-------------------+       |
            |      |      |                              |
            |      |      |  +-------------------+       |

      |  AC Issuer   |

         |
         |Client
         |Acquisition (1)
         |

      |              |     AC in application  |   Service     |
      |     User     +------------------------+  Equipment/   |
      |              |        protocol (2)    | AAA Server    |
      +--------------+                        +---------------+
[ RFC 2905 ] 
            +------+      +-------------------------+
            |      |      | Home ISP                |
            |      |      | (User Home Organization)|
            |      |      |  +-------------------+  |
            |      |      |  |    AAA Server     |  |
            |      |      |  |                   |  |
            |      |      |  +-------------------+  |
            |      |      |             /|\  |      |
            |      |      +--------------+---+------+
            |      |                     |   |
            |      |                     |3  |4
            |      |                     |   |

            |      |      | Visited ISP  |   |      |
            |      |      |              |  \|/     |
            | User |      |  +-------------------+  |
            |      |      |  |    AAA Server     |  |
            |      |      |  |                   |  |

[ RFC 2905 ] 
                                    +-------------+
                                    |             |
                                    | +---------+ |
                                    | |Bandwidth| |
                  +-------+         | |Broker   | |
                  |       |         | |         | |
                  |Service|         | +---------+ |
                  |User   |=========|             |
                  |       |         | +---------+ |
                  |       |         | | Network | |
                  +-------+         | | Routing | |
                                    | | Devices | |
                                    | +---------+ |
                                    | Autonomous  |
                                    | Service     |
                                    | Domain      |
                                    +-------------+
                  ==== contractual
                       relationship
[ RFC 2905 ] 
                        +-------------+        +-------------+
                        |             |        |             |
                        | +---------+ |        | +---------+ |
                        | |Bandwidth| |        | |Bandwidth| |
      +-------+         | |Broker   | |        | |Broker   | |
      |       |         | |         | |        | |         | |
      |Service|         | +---------+ |        | +---------+ |
      |User   |=========|             |========|             |
      |       |         | +---------+ |        | +---------+ |
      |       |         | | Network | |        | | Network | |
      +-------+         | | Routing | |        | | Routing | |
                        | | Devices | |        | | Devices | |
                        | +---------+ |        | +---------+ |
                        | Autonomous  |        | Autonomous  |
                        | Service     |        | Service     |
                        | Domain A    |        | Domain B    |
                        +-------------+        +-------------+
[ RFC 2905 ] 
                        +-------------+        +-------------+
                        |             |        |             |
                        | +---------+ |        | +---------+ |
                        | |Bandwidth| |        | |Bandwidth| |
      +-------+         | |Broker   | |        | |Broker   | |
      |       O***********O         O************O         | |
      |Service|         | +----O----+ |        | +----O----+ |
      |User   |=========|      *      |========|      *      |
      |       |         | +----0----+ |        | +----O----+ |
      |       |         | |Network  | |        | |Network  | |
      +-------+         | |Routing  | |        | |Routing  | |
                        | |Devices  | |        | |Devices  | |
                        | +---------+ |        | +---------+ |
                        | Autonomous  |        | Autonomous  |
                        | Service     |        | Service     |
                        | Domain A    |        | Domain B    |
                        +-------------+        +-------------+
[ RFC 2905 ] 
                        +-------------+        +-------------+
                        |             |        |             |
                        | +---------+ |        | +---------+ |
                        | |Bandwidth| |        | |Bandwidth| |
      +-------+         | |Broker   | |        | |Broker   | |
      |       |         | |         | |        | |         | |
      |Service|         | +----O----+ |        | +----O----+ |
      |User   |=========|      *      |========|      *      |
      |       |         | +----O----+ |        | +----O----+ |
      |       O***********O Network O************O Network | |
      +-------+         | | Routing | |        | | Routing | |
                        | | Devices | |        | | Devices | |
                        | +---------+ |        | +---------+ |
                        | Autonomous  |        | Autonomous  |
                        | Service     |        | Service     |
                        | Domain A    |        | Domain B    |

[ RFC 2905 ] 
                               +-------------------+
                               |  Certificate      |
           ....................|  Authority        |
          :                  ..|                   |..
          :                 :  +-------------------+  :
          :                 :                         :
          :                 :                         :
          :  ***************:***********************  :
          :  *          +---:---------+        +---*--:------+
          :  *          |   :         |        |   *  :      |
          :  *          | +-:-------+ |        | +-O--:----+ |
          :  *          | |{C}      | |        | |   {C}   | |
      +---:--O+         | |Bandwidth| |        | |Bandwidth| |
      |  {C}  O***********O Broker  O************O Broker  | |
      |Service|         | +----O----+ |        | +----O----+ |
      |User   |=========|      *      |========|      *      |
      |       |         | +----0----+ |        | +----O----+ |
      |       |         | |Network  | |        | |Network  | |
      +-------+         | |Routing  | |        | |Routing  | |
                        | |Devices  | |        | |Devices  | |
                        | +---------+ |        | +---------+ |
                        | Autonomous  |        | Autonomous  |
                        | Service     |        | Service     |
                        | Domain A    |        | Domain B    |
                        +-------------+        +-------------+
[ RFC 2905 ] 
   +-------+         +-------+         +-------+         +-------+
   |       |         |       |         |       |         |       |
   |       |RAR      |       |    1    |       |   2     |       |
   | User  |-------->|       |-------->|       |-------->|       |
   |       |     RAA | BB1   |    4    |  BB2  |   3     |  BB3  |
   |       |<--------|       |<--------|       |<--------|       |
   |       |         |       |         |       |         |       |

   | User  |-------->|       |-------->|       |-------->|       |
   |       |     RAA | BB1   |    2    |  BB2  |   4     |  BB3  |
   |       |<--------|       |<--------|       |<--------|       |

[ RFC 2905 ] 
           adjacent BB <---------------------------> adjacent BB
                                     |
                                     V
                      +------------------------------+
                      |       | inter-domain |       |
                      |        --------------  ------|
          application |                       |  PM  |
          server  \   |                       |iface |
                   \  |-------   ---------+    ------|
                    ->| user/ | | simple  |    ------|
          user/host-->| app   | | policy  |   | NMS  |
                    ->| iface | | services|   |iface |
                   /  |-------   ---------+    ------|
          network /   |                              |
          operator    |  -------          -------    |
                      | | data  |        |routing|   |
                      | | store |        |info   |   |
                      | |       |        |       |   |
                      |  -------          -------    |
                      |                              |
                      |       ----------------       |
                      |      | intra-domain   |      |
                      +------------------------------+
                                     ^
                                     |
        edge router(s) <---------------------------> edge router(s)
[ RFC 2905 ] 
            +------+       +----------------------+
            |      |       | File Service         |----+
            |      |       | AAA Server           |<-+ |
            |      |       +----------------------+  | |
            |      |       |                      |  | |
            |      |       | File Server          |  | |
            |      |       |                      |  | |
            | User |       +----------------------+  | |
            |      |                                 | |
            |      |                                 | |
            |      |                                 | |
            |      |       +----------------------+  | |
            |      |------>| Print Service        |--+ |
            |      |<------| AAA Server           |<---+
            |      |       +----------------------+
            |      |       | Print Server         |
            |      |       |  and Printer         |
            +------+       +----------------------+
[ RFC 2905 ] 
               +------+       +----------------------+
               |      |------>| File Service         |
               |      |<------| AAA Server           |
               |      |       +----------------------+
               |      |
               |      |       +----------------------+
               |      |       | File Server          |
               | User |       +----------------------+
               |      |              /|\  |
               |      |               |   |
               |      |               |  \|/
               |      |       +----------------------+
               |      |------>| Print Service        |
               |      |<------| AAA Server           |
               |      |       +----------------------+
               |      |       | Print Server         |
               |      |       |  and Printer         |
               +------+       +----------------------+
[ RFC 2905 ] 
      +------+       +----------------------+
      |      |------>| File Service         |
      |      |<------| AAA Server           |
      |      |Get AC +----------------------+
      |      |
      |      |       +----------------------+
      |      |       | File Server          |----+
      |      |       |                      |<-+ |
      | User |       +----------------------+  | |
      |      |                                 | |
      |      |   +---authorize passing AC      | |<---Create session
      |      |   |                             | |    Using AC
      |      |   V   +----------------------+  | |
      |      |------>| Print Service        |  | |
      |      |<------| AAA Server           |  | |
      |      |       +----------------------+  | |
      |      |       | Print Server         |--+ |
      |      |       |  and Printer         |<---+
      +------+       +----------------------+
[ RFC 2905 ] 
                     +---------------------------------------------+
                     | +-----------------------------------------+ |
                     | |          Faculty administration         | |
                     | |+----------------+     +----------------+| |
                     | |O Student        |     | Curriculum     || |
                     | *| Administration O*****O Commission     || |
                     |*|| AAA Server     |     | AAA Server     || |
                     */|+---O------O-----+     +-----O------O---+| |
                    *//|    *       *               *       *    | |
                   *// +----*---------*-----------*---------*----+ |
                  *//|      *   ||      *       *     ||    *      |
                 *// |      *   ||        *   *       ||    *      |
                *//  |      *   ||          *         ||    *      |
               *//   |      *   ||        *   *       ||    *      |
              *//    |      *   ||      *       *     ||    *      |
             *//     | +----*---------*--+     +--*---------*----+ |
            *//      | |    *       *    |     |    *       *      |
           *//       | |+---O------O----+|     |+----O------O---+| |
          *//        | || Educator A    ||     || Educator B    || |
         *//         | || AAA Server    ||     || AAA Server    || |
        *//          | || Service admin.||     || Service admin.|| |
       *//           | |+---O-----------+|     |+-----------O---+| |
      *//            | |    *            |     |            *    | |
   +-O-------+       | |    *            |     |            *    | |
   |         |       | |+---O-----------+|     |+-----------O---+| |
   | Student |       | || Educator      ||     || Educator      || |
   |         |       | || Course A      ||     || Course B      || |
   |         |       | |+---------------+|     |+---------------+| |
   +---------+       | +-----------------+     +-----------------+ |
                     |                   Faculty                   |
                     +---------------------------------------------+
[ RFC 2905 ] 
                   +----------------------------------------------+
                   |                                              |
                   |  +----------------+  6   +----------------+  |
                   |  | Student        |----->| Curriculum     |  |
                   |  | Administration |<-----| Commission     |  |
                   |  | AAA Server     |  5   | AAA Server     |  |
                   |  +----------------+    _ +----------------+  |
                   |    /|\ |               /|/                   |
                   |     |  |              / /                    |
                   |  2,8|  |3            / /6                    |
                   |     |  |           4/ /                      |

                   |     |  |          / /                        |

                   |  | Educator A    |        | Educator B    |  |

                   |    /|\ |                                     |
                   |2,4,8|  |3,6                                  |

[ RFC 2907 ] 
                      .......   *******
                   ...       ***       ***        A Only hears S
                 ..        **   ..        **      B hears S and R
                .         *       .         *     C Only hears R
               .         *         .         *
               .         S<------->R         *    . TTL Boundary for S
               .         *         .         *    * TTL Boundary for R
                .    A    *   B   .   C     *
                 ..        **   ..        **
                   ...       ***       ***
                      .......   *******
[ RFC 2907 ] 
                    ........................
                  .                          .
                 .        many hops           .
                 .S<------------------------>R.
                 .                            .
                  .                          .
                    ........................
[ RFC 2907 ] 
        . . . . .  . . . . . . . . . . . . .
       .            scope a                 .     Scope Boundaries
      .                                      .     . = scope  a
     .  _______________      ________________ .    - = scopes b,c
     . /    scope b    \    /  scope c       \ .   # = scopes d,e,f, & g
     .|                 |  |                  |.
     .|  #####    ##### |  |  #####    #####  |.
     .| #scope#  #scope#|  | #scope#  #scope# |.
      .\ # d  #  # e   #|  | # f   #  #  g # /.
       .\ ####    #####/    \ #####    #### /.
        .\____________/      \_____________/.
         . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .
[ RFC 2907 ] 
           Code        Len     Count  Nest State Matrix
      +-----+-----+-----+-----+-----+-----+-...-+-----+
      |    17     |     p     | m   | N1  |     | Nm  |
      +-----+-----+-----+-----+-----+-----+-...-+-----+
[ RFC 2908 ] 
   +--------------------------+         +------------------------+
   |                          |         |                        |
   |       to other peers     |         |   to other peers       |
   |          ||   //         |         |      ||  //   ||       |
   |          Prefix          |         |    Prefix     Prefix   |
   |       Coordinator        |         |Coordinator  Coordinator|
   +------------||------------+         +-------||----//---------+
                ||Layer 3                       ||   //
   +------------||------------------------------||--//-----------+
   |          Prefix                          Prefix             |
   |       Coordinator=======================Coordinator         |
   |             ^                              ^                |
   |             +----------------+-------------+                |
   |             |       Layer 2  |             |                |
   |     MAAS<---/                |             +---> MAAS       |
   |     ^   ^                    v                    ^         |
   |     .    .                 MAAS                   .         |
   |     .     .Layer 1           ^                    .Layer 1  |
   |     v      v                 .Layer 1             v         |
   | Client   Client              v                 Client       |
   |                           Client                            |
   +-------------------------------------------------------------+
[ RFC 2909 ] 
                         T1a-----------T2a
                          |             |
                          |             |
                          |             |
                  P3a====P3b           P4a====P4b
                   |      |           / |    / | \
                   |      |   _______/  |   /  |  \
                   |      |  /          |  /   |   \______
                   |      | /           | /    |          \
                  C5a====C5b           C6a====C6b----------C7a
                    \\  //
                     \\//
                     C5c
[ RFC 2909 ] 
                                 T1a-----------T2a
                                  |             |
                      ............|.......      |
                      .           |      .      |
                      .   P3a====P3b     .     P4a
                      .    |      |      .    /
                      .    |      |   _______/
                      .    |      |  /   .
                      .    |      | /    .

[ RFC 2910 ] 
   -----------------------------------------------
   |                  version-number             |   2 bytes  - required
   -----------------------------------------------
   |               operation-id (request)        |
   |                      or                     |   2 bytes  - required
   |               status-code (response)        |
   -----------------------------------------------
   |                   request-id                |   4 bytes  - required
   -----------------------------------------------
   |                 attribute-group             |   n bytes - 0 or more
   -----------------------------------------------
   |              end-of-attributes-tag          |   1 byte   - required
   -----------------------------------------------
   |                     data                    |   q bytes  - optional
   -----------------------------------------------
[ RFC 2910 ] 
   -----------------------------------------------
   |                  version-number             |   2 bytes  - required
   -----------------------------------------------
   |               operation-id (request)        |
   |                      or                     |   2 bytes  - required
   |               status-code (response)        |
   -----------------------------------------------
   |                   request-id                |   4 bytes  - required
   -----------------------------------------------------------
   |        tag (delimiter-tag or value-tag)     |   1 byte  |
   -----------------------------------------------           |-0 or more
   |           empty or rest of attribute        |   x bytes |
   -----------------------------------------------------------
   |              end-of-attributes-tag          |   1 byte   - required
   -----------------------------------------------
   |                     data                    |   y bytes  - optional
   -----------------------------------------------
[ RFC 2911 ] 
   embedded printer:
                                             output device
                                           +---------------+
    O   +--------+                         |  ###########  |
   /|\  | client |------------IPP------------># Printer #  |
   / \  +--------+                         |  # Object  #  |
                                           |  ###########  |
                                           +---------------+

   hosted printer:
                                           +---------------+
    O   +--------+        ###########      |               |
   /|\  | client |--IPP--># Printer #-any->| output device |
   / \  +--------+        # Object  #      |               |
                          ###########      +---------------+

                                            +---------------+
   fan out:                                 |               |
                                        +-->| output device |
                                    any/    |               |
    O   +--------+      ###########   /     +---------------+
   /|\  | client |-IPP-># Printer #--*
   / \  +--------+      # Object  #   \     +---------------+
                        ########### any\    |               |
                                        +-->| output device |
                                            |               |
                                            +---------------+

                                                     /
       +----> pending --------> processing ---------+------> completed
       |         ^                   ^               \
   --->+         |                   |                +----> aborted
       |         v                   v               /
       +----> pending-held    processing-stopped ---+

               |<--- data width --->|

                | Customer Network Management Station |

                    |              |               |

            |       ^       |      ^        |      ^
            | +-----------+ | +-----------+ | +-----------+ |
            | |           | | |           | | |           | |

 |        | | |           | | |           | | |           | | |        |

                       -----          -------- (frm any state)
                     /       \      /  rcv ABORT      [ABORT]
    rcv INIT        |         |    |   ----------  or ----------
    --------------- |         v    v   delete TCB     snd ABORT
    generate Cookie  \    +---------+                 delete TCB
    snd INIT ACK       ---|  CLOSED |
                          +---------+
                           /      \      [ASSOCIATE]
                          /        \     ---------------
                         |          |    create TCB
                         |          |    snd INIT
                         |          |    strt init timer
          rcv valid      |          |
        COOKIE  ECHO     |          v
    (1) ---------------- |      +------------+
        create TCB       |      | COOKIE-WAIT| (2)
        snd COOKIE ACK   |      +------------+
                         |          |
                         |          |    rcv INIT ACK
                         |          |    -----------------
                         |          |    snd COOKIE ECHO
                         |          |    stop init timer
                         |          |    strt cookie timer
                         |          v
                         |      +--------------+
                         |      | COOKIE-ECHOED| (3)
                         |      +--------------+
                         |          |
                         |          |    rcv COOKIE ACK
                         |          |    -----------------
                         |          |    stop cookie timer
                         v          v
                       +---------------+
                       |  ESTABLISHED  |
                       +---------------+
[ RFC 2960 ] 
                          |                   | (D)rcv SHUTDOWN ACK
                          |                   |--------------
                          |                   | stop shutdown timer
                          |                   | send SHUTDOWN COMPLETE
                          |                   | delete TCB
                          |                   |
                          \    +---------+    /
                           \-->| CLOSED  |<--/
                               +---------+
[ RFC 2960 ] 
                                   /--- INIT ACK [Veri Tag=Tag_A,
                                  /              I-Tag=Tag_Z,
   (Cancel T1-init timer) <------/               Cookie_Z, & other info]
                                        (destroy temp TCB)
   COOKIE ECHO [Cookie_Z] ------\
   (Start T1-init timer)         \
   (Enter COOKIE-ECHOED state)    \---> (build TCB enter ESTABLISHED
                                         state)

                                  /---- COOKIE-ACK
                                 /
   (Cancel T1-init timer, <-----/
    Enter ESTABLISHED state)
   {app sends 1st user data; strm 0}
   DATA [TSN=initial TSN_A
       Strm=0,Seq=1 & user data]--\
    (Start T3-rtx timer)            \
                                     \->
                                 /----- SACK [TSN Ack=init
                                             TSN_A,Block=0]
   (Cancel T3-rtx timer) <------/

                                        ...
                                        {app sends 2 messages;strm 0}
                                  /---- DATA
                                 /        [TSN=init TSN_Z
                             <--/          Strm=0,Seq=1 & user data 1]
   SACK [TSN Ack=init TSN_Z,      /---- DATA
         Block=0]     --------\  /        [TSN=init TSN_Z +1,
                               \/          Strm=0,Seq=2 & user data 2]
                        <------/\
                                 \
                                  \------>
[ RFC 2960 ] 
Endpoint A                                          Endpoint Z
<-------------- Association is established---------------------->
Tag=Tag_A                                             Tag=Tag_Z
<--------------------------------------------------------------->
{A crashes and restarts}
{app sets up a association with Z}
(build TCB)
INIT [I-Tag=Tag_A'
      & other info]  --------\
(Start T1-init timer)         \
(Enter COOKIE-WAIT state)      \---> (find a existing TCB
                                      compose temp TCB and Cookie_Z
                                      with Tie-Tags to previous
                                      association)
                                /--- INIT ACK [Veri Tag=Tag_A',
                               /               I-Tag=Tag_Z',
(Cancel T1-init timer) <------/                Cookie_Z[TieTags=
                                               Tag_A,Tag_Z
                                                & other info]
                                     (destroy temp TCB,leave original
                                      in place)
COOKIE ECHO [Veri=Tag_Z',
             Cookie_Z
             Tie=Tag_A,
             Tag_Z]----------\
(Start T1-init timer)         \
(Enter COOKIE-ECHOED state)    \---> (Find existing association,
                                      Tie-Tags match old tags,
                                      Tags do not match i.e.
                                      case X X M M above,
                                      Announce Restart to ULP
                                      and reset association).
                               /---- COOKIE-ACK
                              /
(Cancel T1-init timer, <-----/
 Enter ESTABLISHED state)
{app sends 1st user data; strm 0}
DATA [TSN=initial TSN_A
     Strm=0,Seq=1 & user data]--\
(Start T3-rtx timer)            \
                                 \->
                              /----- SACK [TSN Ack=init TSN_A,Block=0]
(Cancel T3-rtx timer) <------/
[ RFC 2960 ] 
   DATA [TSN=8,Strm=0,Seq=4] ------------> (send ack)
                                 /------- SACK [TSN Ack=8,block=0]
   (cancel T3-rtx timer)  <-----/

   DATA [TSN=9,Strm=0,Seq=5] ------------> (ack delayed)
   (Start T3-rtx timer)
                                          ...
                                          {App sends 1 message; strm 1}
                                          (bundle SACK with DATA)
                                   /----- SACK [TSN Ack=9,block=0] \
                                  /         DATA [TSN=6,Strm=1,Seq=2]
   (cancel T3-rtx timer)  <------/        (Start T3-rtx timer)
[ RFC 2960 ] 
   Endpoint A                                         Endpoint Z
   {App begins to send}
   Data [TSN=7,Strm=0,Seq=3] ------------> (ack delayed)
   (Start T3-rtx timer)
                                           {App sends 1 message; strm 1}
                                           (bundle ack with data)
   DATA [TSN=8,Strm=0,Seq=4] ----\     /-- SACK [TSN Ack=7,Block=0]
                                  \   /      DATA [TSN=6,Strm=1,Seq=2]
                                   \ /     (Start T3-rtx timer)
                                    \
                                   / \
   (Re-start T3-rtx timer) <------/   \--> (ack delayed)
   (ack delayed)
   {send ack}
   SACK [TSN Ack=6,Block=0] --------------> (Cancel T3-rtx timer)
                                           ..
                                           (send ack)
   (Cancel T3-rtx timer)  <-------------- SACK [TSN Ack=8,Block=0]
[ RFC 2960 ] 
      DATA [TSN=8,Strm=0,Seq=4] ---------------> (gap detected,
                                                  immediately send ack)
                                      /----- SACK [TSN Ack=6,Block=1,
                                     /             Strt=2,End=2]
                              <-----/
      (remove 6 from out-queue,
       and mark 7 as "1" missing report)

[ RFC 2963 ] 
           2.5 msec, 34 Mbps                      2.5 msec, 34 Mbps
          <-------------->                      <-------------->
     \+---+                                                     +---+/
     -| C1|--------------+                       +--------------|C1'|-
     /+---+              |                       |              +---+\
     \+---+              |                       |              +---+/
     -| C2|------------+ |                       | +------------|C2'|-
     /+---+            | |                       | |            +---+\
     \+---+            | |                       | |            +---+/
     -| C3|----------+ | |                       | | +----------|C3'|-
     /+---+          | | |                       | | |          +---+\
     \+---+          | | |                       | | |          +---+/
     -| C4|--------+ +-+----------+     +----------+-+ +--------|C4'|-
     /+---+        |   |          |     |          |   |        +---+\
     \+---+        +---|          |     |          |---+        +---+/
     -| C5|------------|   ER1    |-----|   ER2    |------------|C5'|-
     /+---+        +---|          |     |          |---+        +---+\
     \+---+        |   |          |     |          |   |        +---+/
     -| C6|--------+   +----------+     +----------+   +--------|C6'|-
     /+---+            ||||                     ||||            +---+\
     \+---+            ||||      <------->      ||||            +---+/
     -| C7|------------+|||       70 Mbps       |||+------------|C7'|-
     /+---+             |||       10 msec       |||             +---+\
     \+---+             |||                     |||             +---+/
     -| C8|-------------+||                     ||+-------------|C8'|-
     /+---+              ||                     ||              +---+\
     \+---+              ||                     ||              +---+/
     -| C9|--------------+|                     |+--------------|C9'|-
     /+---+               |                     |               +---+\
     \+---+               |                     |               +----+/
     -|C10|---------------+                     +---------------|C10'|-
     /+---+                                                     +----+\
                     Figure A.1. the simulation model.
[ RFC 2967 ] 
                                          +---------+      @
                                 +      ->|         |     -+-
                                /|Protocol|         |      |
                               / |    /   +---------+     / \
                              /  | "B"
                             +   |  /
                             |   |<-
         +-------+           |   |
    O    |       |           |   |
   -+-   |       |<--------->|   |
    |    |       | Protocol  |   |
   / \   |       |  "A"      |   |<-
         +-------+           |   |Protocol
                             |   |   \
                             +   |   "A"  +---------+      @
                              \  |     \  |         |     -+-
                               \ |      ->|         |      |
                                \|        +---------+     / \
                                 +
[ RFC 2967 ] 
              +-------------------------------------+
              |+====+                               |
   HTTP   <-->+|    |<------+  (Full chaining)      |
              ||    |       |                       |
              |+====+       |                       |
              |             |                 +----+|
              |             |      Referral-->|    ||
              |             |      Result  <--|    |+<--> Whois++
              |             |                 +----+|
              |+====+       |                       |
   SMTP   <-->+|    |<------+  (Full chaining)      |
              ||    |       |                       |
              |+====+       |                       |
              |             |                 +----+|
              |             |      Referral-->|    ||
              |             |      Result  <--|    |+<--> LDAPv2
              |             |                 +----+|
              |+====+       |                       |
   Whois++<-->+|    |<------+  (Chain LDAPv2/3)     |
              ||    |       |                       |
              |+====+       |                       |
              |             |                 +----+|
              |             |      Referral-->|    ||
              |             |      Result  <--|    |+<--> LDAPv3
              |             |                 +----+|
              |+====+       |                       |
   LDAPv2 <-->+|    |<------+  (Full chaining)      |
              ||    |       |                       |
              |+====+       |                       |
              |             |                       |
              |+====+       |                       |
   LDAPv3 <-->+|    |<------+  (Chain Whois++)      |
              ||    |       |                       |
              |+====+       |                       |
              |             |                       |
              |             v                       |
              |   +-----------------------+         |
              |   |  Referral Index       |<---------------> Common
              |   |                       |         | Indexing Protocol
              |   +-----------------------+         | (CIP)
              +-------------------------------------+
[ RFC 2968 ] 
             +-----------------+
        (1)  |-----+ Country A |     +-------+
      ------>|Prot1|   DAG     |     |A-WSDP1|
      <------| CAP |     +-----|     | Prot1 |
        (2)  |-----+     |Prot1|     +-------+
             |           | SAP |
      ----+  |           +-----|     +-------+
       (3)|  |    +-------+    |     |A-WDSP2|
          |  |    | RI-A  |    |     | Prot1 |
          |  +-----------------+     +-------+
          |
          |                          +-------+
          |                          |A-WDSP3|
          |                          | Prot2 |
          +----------------+         +-------+
                           |          [...]
                           |
                           |         +-----------------+
                           |         |-----+ Country B |     +-------+
                           +-------->|Prot1|   DAG     |     |B-WSDP1|
                                     | CAP |     +-----|     | Prot2 |
                                     |-----+     |Prot1|     +-------+
                                     |           | SAP |
                                     |           +-----|     +-------+
                                     |    +-------+    |     |B-WDSP2|
                                     |    | RI-B  |    |     | Prot1 |
                                     +-----------------+     +-------+
                                                              [...]
[ RFC 2968 ] 
             +-----------------+
        (1)  |-----+ Country A |     +-------+
      ------>|Prot1|   DAG     |     |A-WSDP1|
      <------| CAP |     +-----|     | Prot1 |
        (2)  |-----+     |Prot1|     +-------+
             |           | SAP |
      ----+  |           +-----|     +-------+
       (3)|  |    +-------+    |     |A-WDSP2|
          |  |    | RI-A  |    |     | Prot1 |

[ RFC 2977 ] 
                   Local Domain                  Home Domain
                 +--------------+           +----------------------+
                 |   +------+   |           |   +------+           |
                 |   |      |   |           |   |      |           |
                 |   | AAAL |   |           |   | AAAH |           |
                 |   |      +-------------------+      |           |
                 |   +---+--+   |           |   +------+           |
                 |       |      |           |                      |
                 |       |      |           +----------------------+
      +------+   |   +---+--+   |
      |      |   |   |      |   |       C    =  client
      |   C  |- -|- -|   A  |   |       A    =  attendant
      |      |   |   |      |   |       AAAL =  local authority
      +------+   |   +------+   |       AAAH =  home authority
                 |              |
                 +--------------+
[ RFC 2977 ] 
                               +------+              +------+
                               |      |              |      |
                               | AAAL +--------------+ AAAH |
                               |      |              |      |
                               +---+--+              +--+---+
                                   |                    |
                                   |                    |
                               +---+--+              +--+---+
   C    =  client              |      |              |      |
   A    =  attendant           |   A  |              |  C   |
   AAAL =  local authority     |      |              |      |
   AAAH =  home authority      +------+              +------+
[ RFC 2977 ] 
                   Local Domain                  Home Domain
                 +--------------+           +----------------------+
                 |   +------+   |           |   +------+           |
                 |   |      |   |           |   |      |           |
                 |   | AAAL |   |           |   | AAAH |           |
                 |   |      +-------------------+      |           |
                 |   +---+--+   |           |   +--+---+           |
                 |       |      |           |      |               |
                 |       |      |           |      |               |
      +------+   |   +---+--+   |           |   +--+---+           |
      |      |   |   |      |   |           |   |      |           |
      |  MN  +- -|- -+  FA  + --  --  --  --  - +  HA  |           |
      |      |   |   |      |   |           |   |      |           |
      +------+   |   +------+   |           |   +------+           |
                 |              |           |                      |
                 +--------------+           +----------------------+
[ RFC 2977 ] 
                 +-------------------------+           +--------------+
                 |  +------+    +------+   |           |   +------+   |
                 |  |      |    |      |   |           |   |      |   |
                 |  |  HA  +----+ AAAL |   |           |   | AAAH |   |
                 |  |      |    |      +-------------------+      |   |
                 |  +-+----+    +---+--+   |           |   +------+   |
                 |    |             |      |           |  Home Domain |
                 |    |  +- - - - - +      |           +--------------+
      +------+   |  +-+--+-+               |
      |      |   |  |      |               |
      |  MN  +------+  FA  |               |
      |      |   |  |      | Local Domain  |
      +------+   |  +------+               |
                 +-------------------------+
[ RFC 2977 ] 
                      +-------------------------+
                      |  +------+    +------+   |
                      |  |      |    |      |   |
                      |  |  HA  +----+ AAAL |   |
                      |  |      |    |      |   |
                      |  +--+---+    +----+-+   |
                      |     |             |     |
                      |     +- - - - - +  |     |
           +------+   |              +-+--+-+   |
           |      |   |              |      |   |
           |  MN  +- -|- - - - - - - +  FA  |   |
           |      |   | Local Domain |      |   |
           +------+   |              +------+   |
                      +-------------------------+
[ RFC 2977 ] 
                Local Domain                        Home Domain
              +--------------+               +----------------------+
              |   +------+   |   +------+    |   +------+           |
              |   |      |   |   |      |    |   |      |           |
              |   | AAAL +-------+ AAAB +--------+ AAAH |           |
              |   |      |   |   |      |    |   |      |           |
              |   +------+   |   +------+    |   +------+           |
              |       |      |               |                      |
              |       |      |               +----------------------+
   +------+   |   +---+--+   |
   |      |   |   |      |   |       C    =  client
   |   C  +- -|- -+   A  |   |       A    =  attendant
   |      |   |   |      |   |       AAAL =  local authority
   +------+   |   +------+   |       AAAH =  home authority
              |              |       AAAB =  broker authority
              +--------------+

     |+--------+propr-+---------+| PINT |     |(Proxy Server)|  PINT
     ||(ICW SL)|ietary|(UAC/UAS)||--- -||-----|     ICW      |----+
     ||SCF/SDF |------|  SCGF   ||   firewall |Server System |    |
     |+--------+ i/f  +---------+|      |     +------------- +    |
     |           SCP             |      |                         |
